segments.text: I see the water spilling over the sink, creating a huge puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is just standing there, drying a plate, completely unaware.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think it’s funny how she hasn’t noticed any of this yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The children are sneaking cookies, and she’s clueless.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for her to realize what’s happening.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is balancing on that stool, and it looks like it’s about to collapse.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I feel like this is one of those moments where everything goes wrong at once.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie, not a care in the world.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t help but laugh at how ridiculous this whole scene is.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope someone takes a picture before it all falls apart.
segments.speaker: PAR
